hadiths.english_translation: The Prophet ﷺ said: You will not cease asking questions until someone among you says: This is Allah Who created all creation, but who created Allah? And the Prophet ﷺ said: When I return to my family, I find a date fallen on my bed or in my house and I pick it up to eat it, then I fear it might be from charity, so I throw it away.
